snippet.title: DokeV – “ROCKSTAR” Official Music Video | The Game Awards 2021
snippet.description:
The characters of DokeV take center stage in this very special performance!
As a THANK YOU for the amazing support and enthusiasm you've shown for DokeV since the gameplay trailer reveal, here's a vibrant and eye-catching dance performance of ROCKSTAR 💃🕺 And if you feel like dancing along, well... who can blame you?!
⭐ This video consists of actual in-game footage.

What is DokeV?
DokeV is an upcoming creature-collecting open world action-adventure from Pearl Abyss filled with intriguing stories and set in a unique, vibrant world. Meet Dokebi, whimsical creatures that live side-by-side with humans and encourage people's dreams from which they gain strength. The gorgeous and colorful world of DokeV is brimming with activities, stories, and experiences, so get ready to befriend tons of Dokebi, embark on an adventure, and rock the world! Who knows, they may be dancing around you, even now..!

Wondering how to pronounce DokeV?
Read it as "doh-keh-vee". It's the world where the Dokebi live in! Hear it all first on DokeV's social media or by subscribing to the official newsletter on the site.

⭐ Learn more: 
https://dokeV.pearlabyss.com 
https://www.twitter.com/DokeVGame 
https://www.instagram.com/DokeVGame
https://www.tiktok.com/@DokeVGame
https://www.facebook.com/DokeVGame 
https://www.giphy.com/DokeV

Want to create content with this video or use the audio for ROCKSTAR? 
We own the rights to the track and made sure there are no copyright issues, so feel free!
Please make sure to follow Pearl Abyss' Fan Content Guidelines: https://bit.ly/3FPQBmQ
🎧 Listen to ROCKSTAR on various streaming services or download the track from the official DokeV site: https://dokeV.pearlabyss.com 

About the video:
» Choreography by 1MILLION Dance Studio
» Featured on The Game Awards 2021 and the Mnet Asian Music Awards (MAMA) 2021 

About the track: 
ROCKSTAR (TAK Remix) 
Arranged by TAK(NEWTYPE) 
Lyrics by 별들의전쟁 * (GALACTIKA *) 
Written by 별들의전쟁 * (GALACTIKA *), 우빈 (GALACTIKA *), SameTime
Vocals by Luena 
Guitar by Jaepil Jeong 
Mixed by TAK(NEWTYPE) 
Mastered by Jung-Un Park @Honey Butter Studio 
Music Producer: Audio Div. of PEARL ABYSS 
Executive Producer: PEARL ABYSS

#DokeV #ROCKSTAR #DokeVMusicVideo #DokeVROCKSTAR

About Pearl Abyss 
Founded in 2010, Pearl Abyss is a global game developer known for the Black Desert MMORPG franchise. We are currently servicing Black Desert across 150 regions on PC, console, and mobile, and developing Crimson Desert, DokeV and PLAN 8 with Pearl Abyss' proprietary next-generation engine.
